overview: A couple, Tom (Donny Damara) and Rieke (Paramitha Rusady) have yet to have children. Rieke’s (Pitrajaya Burnama) father, who doesn’t like Tom, tries to get her to leave Tom. Rieke, who is preoccupied with her career, is assigned abroad and Tom stays behind. Tom then meets Tari (Ayu Azhari), the mistress of a man named Yongki (Leroy Osmani). Tom and Tari have an affair, and Yongki threatens to tell Rieke’s family.
title: Dua Kekasih
